subject: History
goals: Gain an overview of the causes and the key events leading to the outbreak of World War I.
milestones: Understand the major alliances and political tensions in the early 20th century leading to WWI.

learning_tasks.task: Read an overview of the late 19th and early 20th-century European alliances and tensions.
Watch a documentary or short video summarizing the causes of World War I.
Review key terms and definitions related to World War I alliances.

practice_tasks.task: Create a timeline of events leading up to the outbreak of World War I.

resources: 1. Textbook: 'Modern World History' - Chapter on World War I. 2. Video: 'The Road to World War I' on YouTube or other educational platforms. 3. Online resource: BBC History - Causes of World War I.
